column4: you might try installing winetricks and using it to get vcrun2005: http://wiki.winehq.org/winetricks
i added ppa:ubuntu-wine/ppa and installed the winetricks package
sry, i forgot that came from that ppa. You set your WINEPREFIX (if not .wine) and just run it from command line, it pops up a gui and you check the option you want.
